marklogic.body:
OMMGGG!!!! THIS IS WHAT I GOT TO SAY!!!
Yenny is fucking SEXY!!!! Did you see that evil smirk she made when the DJ pulled her? OMG, FUCKING HOT!!! Good on yah Yenny!! New image amazed us, WF!
I was completely blown away with Sunye's VOCAL!!! OMG!!! ITS SOOOO GOOD!! i freaking for the Shivers from it, i waxed my arm yesteday and now my ingrown is now popping up!! I love her hair!! KEEP IT LIKE THAT!! her body is so THIN!!!
Yoobin can really dance!! The DJ move amaze me!! I love her rapping bit and FUCKING, I WANT HER ABS!!! I TRIED SOOO HARD JUST TO GET HER ABS AND I FEEL ON FAILING!!!
SOHEEE!!!! YOU HAVE SO MUCH SCREENING TIME FOR YOUR VERSE!!!!! YOUR IMPROVING HUNNY!! LOVE YOUR HAIR!!!
Lim, As much as i miss Sunmi so much, You also amazed me with your bit, also. Little advice, take Off the flying squirrel please!! Â
